sourceIdentifiers.description: if this company is known by the data source with other identifiers, they can be listed here. E.g., there may be KVK's or UBN's known.

targetIdentifiers.description: if this company is known by the data target with other identifiers, they can be listed here. E.g., there may be FTN's known.

area.description: Bedrijfsoppervlakte RVO mijn percelen (via en van Scan-ICT). Alleen beschikbaar op niveau van KvK BN, dus niet op FTN niveau.

unitCode.description: UN/CEFACT Common Code for Units of Measurement.
